title: Vista 64x font manager?
content: I am looking for a great (not just good) font manager for Vista... Extensis suitcase used to be the winner but it does not work with 64X... any one have any recommendations?
author: Rizzo

comments.content: Thanks I searched and I still cannot find this on the search thanks for link!
no problem - standard disclaimer: typophile search is not very good.
